page.title: 20Local News in Cornard.
page.content: A start has been made on the Sudbury By-pass. It will allow traffic from Bury to join the Colchester\Ipswich road and vice versa without having to negotiate the busy,narrow and conjested town centre of Sudbury. The by-pass which goes through the Industrial Estate will join the A134 Bury Rd. just before Long Melford and the A134 Colchester Rd. near the entrance to the Chilton Industrial Estate where there will be a roundabout linking it to Cornard's Northern Rd. The Cornard council has recently made the village a nuclear free zone and said that Sudbury's Lord Mayor musn't wear his chain of office in Cornard not being Cornard's first citizen. The Country Park along Blackhouse Lane has been planted with trees and will soon be able to receive visitors
